StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SaveShipperAdminDiscrepancy]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @ID uniqueiden..er, @ShipperID int, @DiscrepancySourceID int, @InterviewerID int, @Form1966 varchar(200), @SF86_ENTNAC varchar(200), @SOU varchar(200), @Other varchar(200), @LastEditBy varchar(200) ) AS
IF EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM [USMC].[Shipper_AdminDiscrepancy] WHERE [ID] = @ID) BEGIN UPDATE [MCRISS].[USMC].[Shipper_AdminDiscrepancy] SET [ShipperID] = ShipperID ,[Form1966] = @Form1966 ,[SOU] = @SOU ,[SF86_ENTNAC] = @SF86_ENTNAC ,[Other] = @Other ,[DiscrepancySourceID] = @DiscrepancySourceID ,[InterviewerID] = @InterviewerID WHERE [ID] = @ID END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO [MCRISS].[USMC].[Shipper_AdminDiscrepancy] ([ID] ,[ShipperID] ,[Form1966] ,[SOU] ,[SF86_ENTNAC] ,[Other] ,[DiscrepancySourceID] ,[InterviewerID]) VALUES (@ID ,@ShipperID ,@Form1966 ,@SOU ,@SF86_ENTNAC ,@Other ,@DiscrepancySourceID ,@InterviewerID) END
